price: 68. Nabii Luut diggah A mari yi qibinaay Yi dacayrih gubat yaniinik, toysa isin yoo mayqunxinaay yoo ma wacarriysina keenik iyye.
arabic: قَالَ إِنَّ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ ضَيۡفِي فَلَا تَفۡضَحُونِ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: qāla inna hāulāi ḍayfī falā tafḍaḥūni
